Literature.Title: Phage-displayed heptapeptide sequence conjugation significantly improves the specific targeting ability of antimicrobial peptides against Staphylococcus aureus.
Literature.Author: Wang T, Tan P, Tang Q, Zhou C, Ding Y, Xu S, Song M, Fu H, Zhang Y, Zhang X, Bai Y, Sun Z, Ma X

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus CVCC 1882(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>64µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>64µM),Escherichia coli K88(MIC=32µM),Escherichia coli K99(MIC=>64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15442(MIC=>64µM)
